input.name: __VIEWSTATE

br.span: Per the North Carolina Governor's Executive Order, all NC school buildings will remain CLOSED for studentsfor the remainder of the academic year. During this time, NC public schools areoperating in a period of remote learning.

Por la Orden Ejecutiva del Gobernador de Carolina del Norte,todos los edificios escolares de NC permanecern CERRADOS para los estudiantes para el resto del ao acadmico. Durante este tiempo, las escuelas pblicas de NC estn operando en un perodo de aprendizaje remoto.

div.div: Cultivation, Personalization, Innovation - Every Student, Every Day!

li.a: How to Protect Yourself / Cmo Protegerse

em.span: While it is too soon to know what is still ahead for our schools and communities in North Carolina, please know that Wayne County Public Schools is committed to supporting our families and staff during this time.
Thank you for your patience as we continue to work through the many challenges involved in coordinating the most effective response to this public health emergency.

span.em: Aunque sea demasiado pronto para saber qu les espera anuestras escuelas ycomunidades en Carolina del Norte, sepa que Wayne County Public Schools se compromete apoyar anuestras familias ynuestro personal durante este tiempo. Gracias por su paciencia mientras continuamos trabajando atravs de los muchos desafos involucrados en coordinar la respuesta ms efectiva para esta emergencia de salud pblica.

em.strong: This statement supersedes all previous communication to the public or staff. Please note that this information is accurate as ofApril 28 2020 (4:45 PM)

span.div: Class of 2020 Graduation Planning: Since school buildings were closed in March, our seniors have lost the opportunity to attend prom, take part in senior trips, participate in school sports, and be able to socialize with teachers and classmates in their classrooms and around their schools. Class of 2020, please know that buildings may be closed, but planning for your graduation celebrations are ongoing. While we do not know exactly what commencement ceremonies will look like at the end of the school year, Wayne County Public Schools is committed to honoring the Class of 2020 and helping our graduates bring closure to their high school experience. Like other school districts across North Carolina, we are waiting to receive health and safety guidance from the State as to what will or will not be allowed for our commencement activities. Once we have this information, our high schools will be in touch to help get your input before any final plans are made.

Final Grades & Remote Learning: Over the past two days, several major announcements have come out of Raleigh regarding public education. Yesterday, the State Board of Education approved policy updates regarding final grades for students K-11. The following resources and an FAQ have been developed by the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction to assist families who have questions. We are also working to develop local processes that are aligned with NCDPI guidelines for implementing final grades.

Additionally, this afternoon, North Carolina Governor Cooper announced that remote learning would continue for the remainder of the academic year. This means that while buildings will remain closed, teaching and learning will continue. We thank all of our families who are working with their children and helping them stay connected to their virtual classrooms and remote learning during this time.

em.strong: Esta declaracin sustituir toda comunicacin anterior al pblico oal personal. Por favor note que esta informacin es exacto apartir del24 de abril de 2020 (4:30 PM)

span.div: Calificaciones Finales & Aprendizaje Remoto: En los ltimos dos das, varios anuncios importantes han salido de Raleigh con respecto ala educacin pblica. Ayer, la Junta de Educacin del Estado aprob actualizaciones de pliza con respecto alas calificaciones finales para los estudiantes K-11. Estamos publicando recursos ypreguntas frecuentes en el sitio web del distrito, www.waynecountyschools.org, para ayudar alas familias que tienen preguntas. Tambin estamos trabajando para desarrollar procesos locales que estn alineados con las direcciones de NCDPI para implementar las calificaciones finales.

Adicionalmente, esta tarde, el gobernador de Carolina del Norte, Cooper, anunci que el aprendizaje remoto continuara durante el resto del ao acadmico. Esto significa que mientras los edificios permanecern cerrados, la enseanza yel aprendizaje continuarn. Agradecemos atodas nuestras familias que trabajan con sus hijos ylos ayudan amantenerse conectados con sus aulas virtuales yel aprendizaje remotoy/o mantenerse al da con sus recursos de aprendizaje en papel durante este tiempo.

Meal Distributions CANCELED for Monday:Due to the threat of severe weather, the Salvation Army has canceled all lunch distributions at the ten school meal distribution sites for Monday. Meal distributions will resume again on Tuesday. The Salvation Army apologizes for any inconvenience and looks forward to seeing students who need this service back on Tuesday.

Distribuciones de comidas CANCELADAS para el lunes:Debido ala posibilidad de clima severo maana, el Salvation Army ha cancelado todas las distribuciones de almuerzos en los diez sitios de distribucin de comidas escolares para el lunes.La distribucin de comidas se continuar nuevamente el martes. El Salvation Army se disculpa por cualquier incumbencia yespera ver alos estudiantes que necesitan este servicio el martes.

Spring Break begins tomorrow, and will run through next Friday, April 17. Before this break begins, we would like to acknowledge the hard work of our students, our teachers, our staff and even our parents who have been helping their children embrace this new period of remote learning that schools across North Carolina and the nation have been thrown into. The school year is not over and all students are expected to be engaging with their teachers, their homework and the classroom activities that are being assigned. While there have been many challenges, and at times even abit messy, our schools are seeing many great successes coming out of their remote classrooms. Everyone has an important role and we appreciate your support and your daily efforts to engage in this new style of teaching and learning. As an added note, if you are getting this message, and you are no longer in Wayne County or if your child has not engaged with their teachers since buildings were closed, please call the school and leave amessage or email your child's teacher so we can help you put the appropriate supports in place to help your child be successful and progressing during this time.

div.br: As aquick reminder, there will be no distribution of printed materials or devices during Spring Break. All WCPS meal distribution sites are also closed this Friday. Next week, the Salvation Army will be distributing meals at all ten sites, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday from 11:30 AM until 1PM to ensure there is no gap in service for students over the break.On behalf of Wayne County Public Schools, we hope everyone has asafe and enjoyable Spring Break!

span.div:
Las vacaciones de primavera comienzan maana yse extendern hasta el prximo viernes 17 de abril.Antes de que comience este descanso, nos gustara agradecer todo el trabajo de nuestros estudiantes, nuestros maestros, nuestro personal eincluso nuestros padres que han estado ayudando asus hijos aceptar este nuevo perodo de aprendizaje remoto que las escuelas de Carolina del Norte yde la nacin han empezado.El ao escolar no ha terminado yse espera que todos los estudiantes participen con sus maestros, sus tareas ylas actividades de clase que se les asignan. Ha habido muchos desafos, ya veces un poco desordenado, nuestras escuelas estn viendo muchos xitos grandes saliendo de sus aulas remotas.Todos tienen un papel importante yapreciamos su apoyo ysus esfuerzos diarios para participar en este nuevo estilo de enseanza yaprendizaje. Como nota adicional, si recibe este mensaje yya no se encuentra en el condado de Wayne osi su hijo no se ha comprometido con sus maestros desde que se cerraron los edificios, llame ala escuela ydeje un mensaje oenve un correo electrnico al maestro de su hijo para que podamos puede ayudarlo aestablecer los apoyos adecuados para ayudar asu hijo atener xito yprogresar durante este tiempo.
Como recordatorio rpido, no habr distribucin de materiales en papel odispositivos electrnicos durante las vacaciones de primavera. Todos los sitios de distribucin de comidas de WCPS tambin estn cerrados este viernes. La prxima semana, el Salvation Army distribuir comidas en los diez sitios, lunes, martes, mircoles, jueves yviernes de 11:30 a.m. a1 p.m. para garantizar que no haya brechas en el servicio para los estudiantes durante el receso.Por parte de Wayne County Public Schools, esperamos que todos tengan unas vacaciones de primavera seguras yagradables!

Spring Break Meal Distribution Plan: As areminder, Spring Break is April 10 through April 17 for all schools. This Thursday, April 9, all ten meal distribution sites will provide meals for both Thursday and Friday for those students who need this service. All sites will be closed on Friday. Next week, the Salvation Army will be stepping in to distribute meals at all ten sites, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday from 11:30 AM until 1PM. Together with their support, Wayne County Public Schools can ensure there is no gap in service while we give our hard working school nutrition workers amuch needed break.

Since our buildings were closed in mid-March as part of the States efforts to flatten the curve for COVID-19, Wayne County Public Schools cafeteria staff have distributed over 50,000 meals to students through curbside pickup,"states Dr. Michael Dunsmore, WCPS superintendent. "We are grateful to our local Salvation Army for their efforts to help us give our cafeteria workers some welcome relief. Through their partnership and support, we can ensure students who rely on this valuable service can continue being served while our kitchens are closed over the Spring Break.
The 10 meal distribution sites are as follows:

div.br:
Plan de distribucin de comidas durante las vacaciones de primavera:Como recordatorio, las vacaciones de primavera son del 10 al 17 de abril para todas las escuelas. Este jueves, el 9de abril, los diez sitios de distribucin de comidas proporcionarn comidas para el jueves yviernes para aquellos estudiantes que necesiten este servicio. Todos los sitios estarn cerrados el viernes. La prxima semana, el Salvation Army intervendr para distribuir comidas en los diez sitios, lunes, martes, mircoles, jueves yviernes de 11:30 a.m. a1 p.m. Junto con su apoyo, Wayne County Public Schools puede garantizar que no haya una brecha en el servicio mientras brindamos anuestros trabajadores de nutricin de la escuela que trabajan duro un descanso muy necesario.
"Dado que nuestros edificios se cerraron amediados de marzo como parte de los esfuerzos del Estado para aplanar la curva para COVID-19, el personal de la cafetera de Wayne County Public Schools ha distribuido ms de 50,000 comidas alos estudiantes atravs de la recogida en la acera", declara el Dr. Michael Dunsmore, WCPS superintendente ". Estamos agradecidos con nuestro Salvation Army local por sus esfuerzos para ayudarnos adar anuestros trabajadores de la cafetera un alivio bienvenido. Atravs de su asociacin yapoyo, podemos asegurar que los estudiantes que confan en este valioso servicio puedan continuar siendo atendidos mientras nuestras cocinas estn cerradas durante las vacaciones de primavera ".
Como recordatorio, los 10 sitios de distribucin de comidas son los siguientes:

img.longdesc: Wayne County Park & Ride - Free WIFI for student learning

span.div: Park & Learn: Do you or your familiy lack reliable Internet at home?This week, Wayne County Public Schools and the United Way of Wayne County launched aPark & Learn initiative, which allows families to take advantage of identified parking areas around Wayne County which have free and publicly accessible WiFi for students to use to complete online homework and activities. Acomplete list of Park & Learn sites will be posted at WCPS schools, handed out with meals at the ten distribution sites, and can be accessed at the printable list below or athttps://www.unitedwayne.org/superheroesand on Facebook and Twitter at @WayneCountyPS.Families who cannot access acopy of the list can call 919-735-3591 to help find aPark & Learn location nearest them.
PrintablePark & Learn Site List

img.longdesc: Wayne County Park & Ride - Free WIFI for student learning

span.div: Parquear & Aprender: Su familia no tienen acceso awifi oun dispositivo de computadora, en casa? Esta semana, Wayne County Public Schools yel United Way of Wayne County lanzaron la nueva iniciativa "Park & Learn", que le permite afamilias aprovechar las reas de parqueoidentificadas alrededor del condado de Wayne que tienen WiFi gratis yaccesible al pblico para que los estudiantes puedan completar tareas yactividades por internet. Una lista completa de los sitios de Park & Learn se publicar en las escuelas WCPS, yse repartir con las comidas en los diez sitios de distribucin,yen Facebook yTwitter en la pagina @WayneCountyPS.Las familias que no pueden acceder auna copia de la lista pueden llamar al 919-735-3591 para ayudar aencontrar una ubicacin de Park & Learn ms cercana aellos.
Lista Printiable de sitios de Park & Learn

Distance Learning Underway:Teachers are leading lessons and assigning work online. For students who do not have access to wifi or acomputer device,schools are providing printed materials for pick up and loaning out devices to assist students at home. Our schools areall working to help students continue to learn and grow academically. Teachers are giving feedback on student work, and all work is being counted for credit. WCPS encourages parents to work with their child to help them stay on aschedule, complete all of their assignments, and help them access online or paper resources as much as you are able. School is still in session, even though it looks and feels different at this time.
If parents have questions or concerns about the work your child should be completing, please contact your child's teacher and or school principal for help and support.

Aprendizaje a Distancia Ya Est en Marcha:Los maestros estn impartiendo lecciones yasignando trabajo por internet, ypara los estudiantes que no tienen acceso awifi oun dispositivo de computadora, las escuelas estn proporcionando materiales en papel para recoger yprestando dispositivos para ayudar alos estudiantes en el hogar. Todos estamos trabajando para ayudar alos estudiantes acontinuar aprendiendo ycreciendo acadmicamente. Los maestros estn retroalimentando el trabajo de los estudiantes, ytodo el trabajo se cuenta para crdito. Alentamos alos padres atrabajar con sus hijos para ayudarlos acumplir un horario, completar todas sus tareas yayudarlos acceder recursos por internet oen papel tanto como sea posible. La escuela todava est en sesin, apesar de que se ve yse siente diferente en este momento.
Si tiene preguntas sobre el trabajo que su hijo debe completar, comunquese con el maestro oel director de la escuela de su hijo para obtener ayuda yapoyo.

ul.li: This week, WCPS will be distributing meals daily (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday) at the ten meal distribution sites for students who need this service.

Spring Break will be held as scheduled, April 10 through April 17. This will give all of our students, parents and staff aneeded break after being thrown into this new style of remote teaching and learning that has been put in place during the statewide school closure.

IMPORTANT: During Spring Break, WCPS will not be distributing meals in order to give all of our hard working cafeteria workers aneeded break too. The district administration is however working with the county and local agencies to ensure there are community meal programs in place, so that there is no gap in service for students over the break. More information will be provided once details are finalized.
Esta semana, el distrito distribuir comidas diariamente (lunes, martes, mircoles, jueves yviernes) en los diez sitios de distribucin de comidas para los estudiantes que necesitan este servicio.

Las vacaciones de primavera se llevarn como programado, del 10 de abril al 17 de abril. Esto les dar atodos nuestros estudiantes, padres ypersonal un descanso necesario despus de participar en este nuevo estilo de enseanza yaprendizaje que se ha implementado durante el cierre de las escuelas estatal.

IMPORTANTE: Durante las vacaciones de primavera, el distrito no distribuir comidas para darles atodos nuestros trabajadores de la cafetera un descanso necesario. Sin embargo, la administracin del distrito est trabajando con las agencias locales ydel condado para garantizar que existan programas de comidas comunitarias, para que no haya una brecha en el servicio para los estudiantes durante el receso. Se proporcionar ms informacin una vez que se finalicen los detalles.

span.div: Enrichment Materials: The following update is intended for WCPS families whose elementary child do not have access to the Internet and an electronic learning device at home. To assistelementary students who are unable to participate in virtual learning at this time, the district has developed hard copy, grade appropriate, enrichment resources and some limited supplies, that will be available for pickup at the ten meal distribution sites this week today and Friday.Elementary materials will be available at each of the following sites from 11:30 AM to 1PM:
span.p:
These hard copy district resources are different from what many teachers are developing for their students to pick up at their individual schools. The districts hard copy materials are again only intended for elementary students lacking access to virtual learning resources at this time.Schools will let parents in need of this service know when materials are available for other grade levels to pick up.
Families who are unable to travel to apick-up site, but who are in need of these materials for their child should contact 919-735-3591.

em.strong: Esta declaracin sustituir toda comunicacin anterior al pblico oal personal. Por favor note que esta informacin es exacto apartir del25 de marzo de 2020 (9:45 AM)

span.div: Recursos de Enriquecimiento:Este mensaje solo est destinado alas familias de WCPS que tienen un hijo deprimaria que no tiene acceso aInternet yun dispositivo de aprendizaje electrnico en el hogar. Como recordatorio ycorreccin del mensaje de ayer, para ayudar alos estudiantes deprimaria que no pueden participar en el aprendizaje virtual en este momento, el distrito ha desarrollado una copia en papel, recursos de enriquecimiento apropiados para su grado yalgunos suministros limitados, que estarn disponibles para recoger en los diez sitios de distribucin de comidas esta semana, hoy yviernes de 11:30-1:00 pm.Los materiales deprimaria estarn disponibles en cada sitio:
span.p: Estos recursos en papel del distrito son diferentes de lo que muchos maestros estn desarrollando para que sus alumnos recojan en sus escuelas individuales. Los materiales en papel del distrito estn destinados aestudiantes deprimaria que no tienen acceso arecursos de aprendizaje virtual en este momento. Las escuelas informarn alos padres que necesiten este servicio cuando los materiales estn disponibles para que otros niveles de grado los recojan.
span.div: Las familias que no tienen la capacidad de acceder alos materiales en papel necesarios durante los sitios de distribucin de alimentos deben comunicarse al 919-735-3591.

Governor's Executive Order:Today, North Carolina Governor, Roy Cooper, extended the state's school closure until Friday, May 15. The North Carolina Department of Public Instruction has shared that its staff is currently working with the governor, the state Board of Education, and other agencies to develop and finalize plans for schools. While there are more questions than answers at this time, Wayne County Public Schools will continue working to keep its students, families and staff informed as clear information and guidance is provided.

Orden Ejecutiva del Gobernador:Hoy el gobernador de Carolina del Norte, Roy Cooper, extendi el cierre de las escuelas en el estado hasta el viernes, el 15 de mayo. El Departamento de Instruccin Pblica de Carolina del Norte ha compartido que su personal est trabajando actualmente con el gobernador, la Junta de Educacin del estado yotras agencias para desarrollar yfinalizar planes para las escuelas. Aunque hay ms preguntas que respuestas, Wayne County Public Schools continuarn trabajando para mantener informados asus estudiantes, familias ypersonal amedida que se brinde informacin clara.

Meal distribution sites: This week, WCPS is closing the Wayne Academy meal distribution site where there has been less participation and will be shifting staff and resources to other sites that are seeing much larger numbers. This week, families who need this service for their child may still visit the following meal distribution sites between 11:30 a.m. and 1:00 p.m on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday to pick up meals:

Sitios de Recogida de Alimentacin Para Estudiantes:Esta semana, el distrito cerrar el sitio de distribucin de comidas en Wayne Academy, donde ha habido menos participacin. El personal ylos recursos se van amover aotros sitios que estn viendo nmeros mucho ms grandes. Las familias que necesitan este servicio para sus hijos pueden visitar los siguientes sitios de distribucin de comidas desde las 11:30 a.m. yla 1:00 p.m. los lunes, mircoles yviernes para recoger las comidas:

Friday Update: We have now completed the first week of North Carolinas school closure. The Wayne County Public Schools administration would like to say thank you to everyone for your patience and flexibility during this time. We would like to commend our staff who have been working to be apart of the state-wide effort to provide essential services and academic supports to our students during this unprecedented school closure. We would also like to express our sincerest appreciation to the school nutrition staff who gave out nearly 12,000 grab and go meals on very short notice through curbside pick up this week.

Remote Learning Survey:WCPS is working diligently to determine how we can best facilitate learning during the mandated school closing. We are asking parents to complete the WCPS Remote Learning survey (http://bit.ly/wcpsremotelearningsurvey) to assist us in planning quality learning experiences.

Actualizacin del Viernes:Ya hemos completado la primera semana de cierres de nuestras escuelas en Carolina del Norte. La administracin de Wayne County Public Schools quisiera agradecer atodos por su paciencia yflexibilidad durante este tiempo. Nos gustara felicitar anuestro personal que ha estado trabajando durante este esfuerzo estatal para dar servicios esenciales yapoyo acadmico anuestros estudiantes durante este cierre escolar sin precedentes. Quisiramos expresar nuestro agradecimiento al personal de nutricin escolar que entreg casi 12,000 comidas para recoger yllevar con muy poco tiempo esta semana.

Encuesta de Educacin Remota:WCPS est trabajando diligentemente para determinar la mejor manera de facilitar el aprendizaje durante el cierre de las escuelas. Les pedimos alos padres que completen la encuestaWCPS Encuesta de Educacin Remotapara ayudarnos aplanificar experiencias de aprendizaje de calidad. (https://bit.ly/espanolremotelearningsurvey)

Student Work & Enrichment Activities/Remediation:Many teachers have worked to develop packets of instructional resources this week for students to complete during the closure. Schools will be notifying families if their childs teacher has resources that can be picked up at adesignated time. We respect that many families may not be able to come to aschool at this time. There is no requirement for any parent to pick up these materials. All materials distributed at this time are for enrichment purposes only.

Urgent needs to pick up personal belongings:Parents, if you have an urgent need to pick up personal items that belong to your child that are locked up at the school, please contact your childs school.Please be reminded we are working to follow CDC guidelines for social distancing and are working to limit the number of people in our buildings. We are asking that requests be for urgent needs only.
WCPS Translations of messages:This week, the district began translating all messages to Spanish to assist our latino and Hispanic families.

Actividades /Trabajo para Estudiantes: Muchos maestros han trabajado para desarrollar paquetes de recursos educativos esta semana para que los alumnos los completen durante el cierre. Las escuelas notificarn alas familias si el maestro de su hijo tiene recursos que se pueden recoger ala hora designada. Respetamos que muchas familias quizs no puedan venir auna escuela en este momento. No hay ningn requisito para que ningn padre recoja estos materiales. Todos los materiales distribuidos en este momento son solo para enriquecimiento.
Necesidades urgentes para recoger sus pertenencias personales: Padres, si tienen una necesidad urgente de recoger artculos de su hijo que estn encerrados en la escuela, comunquese con la escuela de su hijo. Recuerde que estamos trabajando para seguir las rdenes de los CDC para el distanciamiento social yestamos trabajando para limitar el nmero de personas en nuestros edificios. Estamos pidiendo que las solicitudes sean solo para necesidades urgentes.
WCPS Traducciones de Mensajes: Esta semana, el distrito comenz atraducir todos los mensajes al espaol para ayudar anuestras familias latinas ehispanas.

Meal Distribution Sites: Wayne County Public Schools recognizes that there are anumber of organizations in Wayne County which help feed children during school breaks. Because our schools and community are now experiencing an unprecedented closure, Wayne County Public Schools has been granted federal authority to launch 11 meal distribution sites to provide additional feeding supports to help those students who are unsure where their next meal will be coming from. On Tuesday, March 17, the program launched serving 1,800 meals.

div.br:
The curbside pickup sites are as follows:
Brogden Middle
Charles B. Aycock High
Carver Elementary
Carver Heights Elementary
Eastern Wayne High
Grantham Middle
Meadow Lane Elementary
Rosewood Elementary
Spring Creek Middle
Tommys Road Elementary
Wayne Academy

span.div: All sites will be open from 11:30 AM to 1PM Thursday and Friday. The sites will be open again next week, Monday, Wednesday and Friday at these same times. Parents who are unable to travel to apick-up site, but who are in need of meal assistance for their child should contact 919-735-3591.

Sitios de Recogida de Alimentacin Para Estudiantes:Wayne County Public Schools reconoce que hay varias organizaciones en Wayne Community que ayudan aalimentar alos nios durante las vacaciones escolares. Como nuestras escuelas yla comunidad ahora estn experimentando un cierre sin precedentes, por autoridad federal WCPS brindar apoyo de alimentacin en 11 sitios de Recogida para ayudar aestudiantes que no estn seguros de dnde vendr su prxima comida. El martes, el program sirvi 1,800 comidas.Los sitios son los siguientes:

br.br: Los sitios estarn abiertos el jueves yviernes de esta semana, de 11:30 a.m. a1 p.m. La prxima semana, van apoder ir alos sitios el lunes, mircoles yviernes durante estos mismos horarios. Los padres que no pueden llegar aun sitio de recogida, pero necesitan asistencia alimentaria para sus hijos deben llamar 919-735-3591.

span.div: Student Meal Distribution Sites: Today's meal distribution events were very successful with approximately 1,800 meals being given out at ten sites. WCPS is adding anew site at Brogden Middle, which will open on Thursday. The WCPS School Nutrition Department will be bringing in additional cafeteria staff to assist at the sites. Again, we appreciate all of the offers from staff and community members to volunteer their assistance with meal distributions. However, we are only allowing school nutrition staff to operate at the sites to limit the number of individuals at these sites during these times.

br.em: I am awed by the staff who helped meet the overwhelming response from families who took advantage of the meal distribution events today, states Dr. Michael Dunsmore, superintendent. I cannot be more proud of our School Nutrition Department and all of the cafeteria workers who helped make WCPS among the first school districts in North Carolina to offer this level of service during this closure.

div.br:
Sitios de Recogida de Alimentacin Para Estudiantes:Los eventos de distribucin de comidas hoy fueron muy exitosos con aproximadamente 1,800 comidas repartidas en diez sitios. WCPS est adicionando un nuevo sitio en Brogden Middle, que se abrir el jueves. El Departamento de Nutricin Escolar de WCPS traer personal de cafetera adicional para ayudar en los sitios. Nuevamente, apreciamos todas las ofertas del personal ylos miembros de la comunidad ofreciendo su asistencia voluntariamente con la distribucin de comidas. Sin embargo, solo permitimos que el personal de nutricin escolar opere en los sitios para limitar el nmero de personas en estos sitios durante estos tiempos.
"Estoy impresionado por el personal que ayud aresponder ala abrumadora respuesta de las familias que aprovecharon los eventos de distribucin de comidas de hoy", afirma el Dr. Michael Dunsmore, superintendente. "No puedo estar ms orgulloso de nuestro Departamento de Nutricin Escolar yde todos los trabajadores de la cafetera que ayudaron aque WCPS estuviera entre los primeros distritos escolares de Carolina del Norte en ofrecer este nivel de servicio durante este cierre".

span.div: School Closures Update:Earlier today our district administration met and received guidance from the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction regarding the school closures that were put in place by the Governor yesterday. The district administration has provided guidance to all staff via email and is now in the process of working to put in place key supports that will benefit our students and families during this unprecedented closure, which is in place until March 30, unless extended by Governor Roy Cooper. As shared with staff by superintendent Dr. Michael Dunsmore,

"While it is too soon to know what is still ahead for our schools and communities in North Carolina, please know that Wayne County Public Schools is committed to supporting our families and staff during this time," states Dr. Michael Dunsmore, WCPS Superintendent. "Thank you for your patience as we continue to work through the many challenges involved in coordinating the most effective response to this public health emergency."

div.br:
Actualizacin de Cierres de Escuelas:Hoy, la administracin del distrito se reuni yrecibi orientacin del Departamento de Instruccin Pblica de Carolina del Norte sobre los cierres de escuelas que el Gobernador estableci ayer. La administracin del distrito ha orientado atodo el personal por correo electrnico yahora est trabajndor para establecer apoyos que beneficiarn anuestros estudiantes yfamilias durante este cierre sin precedentes que permanecer para los estudiantes hasta el 30 de marzo, amenos que sea extendida. Segn lo compartido con el personal por el superintendente Dr. Michael Dunsmore,
"Aunque sea demasiado pronto para saber qu les espera anuestras escuelas ycomunidades en Carolina del Norte, sepa que Wayne County Public Schools se compromete apoyar anuestras familias ynuestro personal durante este tiempo.", declara el Dr. Michael Dunsmore, Superintendente de WCPS. "Gracias por su paciencia mientras continuamos trabajando atravs de los muchos desafos involucrados en coordinar la respuesta ms efectiva para esta emergencia de salud pblica".

span.div: Executive Order Update: The Wayne County Public Schools administration recognizes that you probably have many questions regarding Governor Cooper's Executive Order to close school for students for aminimum of two weeks. At this time, North Carolina school districts have received very limited details from the State and we do not know yet what this order means for staff. At this time, we can share that all schools are now CLOSED for students, which includes Pre-K programs. Wayne County Public Schools will work to keep our families and staff informed and will be sending out afollow-up update tomorrow afternoon after we have more details.
Click on LINK to read Governor Cooper'sExecutive Order.

Actualizacin de la Orden Ejecutiva: La administracin de Wayne County Public Schools reconoce que usted probablemente tenga muchas preguntas sobre la Orden Ejecutiva del Gobernador Cooper de cerrar las escuelas para los estudiantes por un mnimo de dos semanas. En este momento, los distritos escolares de Carolina del Norte han recibido detalles muy limitados del Estado yan no sabemos qu significa esta orden para el personal. En este momento, podemos compartir que todas las escuelas estn CERRADAS para los estudiantes, lo que incluye programas de Pre-K. Wayne County Public Schools trabajar para mantener informadas anuestras familias yal personal ypublicaremos una actualizacin maana por la tarde despus de que tengamos ms detalles.
Haga clic en la ENLACE para leer la Orden Ejecutiva del Gobernador Cooper.

CLASSES CANCELED: This afternoon the North Carolina Governor issued an executive order and canceled school for students for a minimum of two weeks. Wayne County Public Schools is awaiting guidance from the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction and the North Carolina Board of Education. We will work to keep you informed as more information is provided.

div.br: CLASES CANCELADAS: Esta tarde, el gobernador de Carolina del Norte emiti una orden ejecutiva ycancel la escuela para los estudiantes por un mnimo de dos semanas. Wayne County Public Schools espera la orientacin del Departamento de Instruccin Pblica de Carolina del Norte yla Junta de Educacin de Carolina del Norte. Trabajaremos para mantenerlos informado amedida que se proporcione ms informacin.

text-node.br: Plan de distribucin de comidas durante las vacaciones de primavera:Como recordatorio, las vacaciones de primavera son del 10 al 17 de abril para todas las escuelas. Este jueves, el 9de abril, los diez sitios de distribucin de comidas proporcionarn comidas para el jueves yviernes para aquellos estudiantes que necesiten este servicio. Todos los sitios estarn cerrados el viernes. La prxima semana, el Salvation Army intervendr para distribuir comidas en los diez sitios, lunes, martes, mircoles, jueves yviernes de 11:30 a.m. a1 p.m. Junto con su apoyo, Wayne County Public Schools puede garantizar que no haya una brecha en el servicio mientras brindamos anuestros trabajadores de nutricin de la escuela que trabajan duro un descanso muy necesario.

br.text-node: "Dado que nuestros edificios se cerraron amediados de marzo como parte de los esfuerzos del Estado para aplanar la curva para COVID-19, el personal de la cafetera de las Escuelas Pblicas del Condado de Wayne ha distribuido ms de 50,000 comidas alos estudiantes atravs de la recogida en la acera", declara el Dr. Michael Dunsmore, WCPS superintendente ". Estamos agradecidos con nuestro Ejrcito de Salvacin local por sus esfuerzos para ayudarnos adar anuestros trabajadores de la cafetera un alivio bienvenido. Atravs de su asociacin yapoyo, podemos asegurar que los estudiantes que confan en este valioso servicio puedan continuar siendo atendidos mientras nuestras cocinas estn cerradas durante las vacaciones de primavera ".
Como recordatorio, los 10 sitios de distribucin de comidas son los siguientes:

div.span:
2001 E. Royall Ave Goldsboro, NC 27534
Phone: (919) 731-5900 | Fax: (919) 705-6199
